thread.title: $1791 -- Peru: Machu Picchu, Lima, Sacred Valley Vacations
thread.title_full: $1791 -- Peru: Machu Picchu, Lima, Sacred Valley Vacations

title: $1791 -- Peru: Machu Picchu, Lima, Sacred Valley Vacations
text:
Home > Vacation Package Deals > $1791 -- Peru: Machu Picchu, Lima, Sacred Valley Vacations $1791 -- Peru: Machu Picchu, Lima, Sacred Valley Vacations   - October 2, 2015 at 6:58 PM Tweet 
Tripmasters is offering a six-night guided adventure to Peru, its "Discover Peru Escorted Group," from $1791. Tour one of the world's Seven Wonders, but the lead up will be just as dazzling with visits to Lima, the Sacred Valley, Cuzco, and other sacred Incan sites. 
This deal includes: Round-trip airfare from Los Angeles (other departure cities available) All transfers, including intra-country flights, airport transfers, and ground and train transfers Two nights' accommodations in Lima Two nights' accommodations in Sacred Valley Two nights' accommodations in Cuzco Six breakfasts, three lunches, four dinners, including dinner show Folk show with dinner at Don Antonio Restaurant Various escorted tour, with English-speaking guides, in Lima, Sacred Valley, Cuzco, and Machu Picchu Attractions' admission fees 
How to get this deal: Visit Tripmasters ' website. Travel at these sample rates is valid with departures from Los Angeles on October 31, 2015, but other dates and departure cities are available. The sale provider hasn't listed a booking deadline. 
The fine print: The price is per person, based on double occupancy and departure from Miami on select dates in 2012. 
How it saves you money: A stay of seven nights in the included hotels costs $875, a round-trip flight between Miami and Peru costs $871, and the extras, such as meals, intra-country airfare, train fare, transfers, and tours, total at least $450 per person, so this deal saves around $350 per person ($700 per couple). 
Don't forget: Always compare prices across multiple properties and from multiple travel providers to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
